testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed When user enter date of birth...............................................passed And user enter email "test@example.com" field...............................passed When user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd".......................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "valid" "test@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"..............passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "invalid" "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"...........passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.name: guest user could change Currencies successfully
testcase.system-out: Given Select Euro currency from the dropdown list on the top left of home page.passed Then Find all Elements with Euro currency...................................passed

testcase.classname: F06_Home Slider | users could slide between two slider (Nokia1020 and Iphone) successfully
testcase.name: user click on slider one Nokia1020

failure.message: The following asserts failed: expected [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020] but found [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/]

testcase.failure:
Given first slider is clickable on home page................................passed Then user should navigate to clickable URL "Nokia1020"......................failed
StackTrace: java.lang.AssertionError: The following asserts failed: expected [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020] but found [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/] at org.testng.asserts.SoftAssert.assertAll(SoftAssert.java:46) at org.testng.asserts.SoftAssert.assertAll(SoftAssert.java:30) at org.example.stepDefs.D06_homeSlidersStepDef.asserCurrenURL(D06_homeSlidersStepDef.java:24) at ✽.user should navigate to clickable URL "Nokia1020"(file:///G:/Work/Selemuim/Projects/NopcommerceAutomationProject/src/main/resources/features/F06_homeSliders.feature:6)
